room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Butte in Butte
review: Me and my family did Budapest Express with two daughters ages 5 and 10. We didn't escape but we had a great time! The staff were great also.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology Butte in Butte
review: Went with some friends and it was so much fun! We went through the Budapest Express barely finished before the time ran out. Laughed a bunch. The lady who was our guide was very friendly and helpful. We even enjoyed the wait time as there were drinks and mind games and riddles to fill the time.
